title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.5 - Keeping right; passing; crossing double solid line
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.5 - Keeping right; passing; crossing double solid line

State Regulations
(a) Slow moving vehicles and all trucks, buses and cars towing trailers shall use the right hand or curb lane of the
roadway except when otherwise directed. (b) Trucks, buses and other slow moving
vehicles proceeding in the same direction shall not overtake and pass each
other. (c) Where the roadway is
divided by a double solid line, vehicles shall not cross the dividing line
unless directed by signs, delineators or by a bridge
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
